website_summaries.verdict: An anti-aging cream containing antioxidants, which fight the free-radicals from pollution.
pros: A legion of Mary Kay fans swear by this
Makes skin feel silky while controlling oil and staying matte on the face
A pleasant scent, and a little goes a long way
cons: Not enough moisturizing effect for some

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Just got to using this. Because I had the real Mary Kay product left over. This was sold to me a while ago. I was stocking up. It’s NOT REAL MARY KAY! FAKE! Smells like some $1 drug store cream plus it’s all sticky on my face. I am so mad should of used this right away when I received it. I’m still going to call Amazon. This is awful. I’ll prob break out from this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jayla

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product the box was beat up. It was not sealed in plastic. It did not have the same consistency as products I purchased in the past. I used the product and it made my face swell and break out. Returning today!!
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: The product is not acceptable from Mary Kay.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I have purchased and both have been grainy. The product is not smooth as others have been. Why have the last two been grainy? I used the first one as I was on vacation. The second one I have just started using it. I think the product is faulty. I am not satisfied with this product. What can you do about it?
customer_reviews.author: edward p kelley

customer_reviews.title: My favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Mary Kay has offered many great products, but this one is my favorite. I have used it for years. I apologize to all the Mary Kay salespeople because buying it on Amazon kills their business. However, I buy everything I need on Amazon and that's my buying habit.
customer_reviews.author: Savtie585

customer_reviews.title: She's still beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using this as long as i can remember and she seems to be more beautiful every day!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Love this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and so bummed that Mary Kay discontinued this awesome moisturizer! I will keep purchasing on Amazon until it’s all gone !
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Fields

customer_reviews.title: Costs less and works better
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a long time and it works well and has not changed over the years I hope Mary Kay keeps this product
customer_reviews.author: MJW

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: had funny smell and not sure it was in original packing. I didn't use, threw it away
customer_reviews.author: RhondaB

customer_reviews.title: Not normal quality?
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because my normal mary Kay person stopped selling and definitely didn’t feel the same as what I previously had. Really runny and ended up throwing the bottle away
customer_reviews.author: Megan E

customer_reviews.title: 5 ***** stars!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and will continue to use it for years to come. Reasonably priced for the results that I get, my skin does not look like I am 62 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very sensitive and acne-prone - as in even the thought of using most brands of moisturizer could cause a breakout (including Cetaphil). Ever since I started using MK Timewise (face wash and moisturizer, no makeup or sunscreen), my skin has cleared up 99%...which made it even worse when my MK rep stopped selling, but now I can get it on Amazon! Yes, it is a little pricey - but I can make a bottle last 4-6 months and I use it twice per day (one pea-sized drop more than does the job).
customer_reviews.author: M.Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: The product bow was damaged. The moisturizer wasn’t sealed, and had already been used. Unsure if it had been tampered with but not going to take the risk. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this moisturizer along with the time wise cleanser for about a year and a half now and I have no complaints at all! I love this product so much!
customer_reviews.author: Christon

customer_reviews.title: Out of Date
customer_reviews.text: I have been using MK for over 30 years. This was the first time that this moisturizer felt like it had separated, it was runny and I actually had to shake it to mix it up. I think it may have been out of date. Would not purchase again on line.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Darling

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I use the product everyday and I have been for years. It is the perfect formula.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced cream
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the bottle came half empty, did nothing for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Galeano

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Mary Kay products. I have used the moisturizing cream for years. A very good product
customer_reviews.author: gm

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Mary Kay for many years and have found the products consistantly dependable
customer_reviews.author: Judy A. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Great product, item was as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product, item was as expected. Arrived quickly. I use all the time. Better to buy it here, don't have to deal with a rep trying to constantly sell me more products.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Zboralski

customer_reviews.title: The feel of skin after use always great!
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved this moisturizer. Now, no longer available. Now they have change to a different skin regimen. Mary Kay made a mistake. I do not like the new system.
customer_reviews.author: Dixies Hat Rack

customer_reviews.title: Exactly like I’ve always used!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like I’ve always used! I’m glad I found this on Amazon. I don’t have an MK rep anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using Mary Kay cleanser, moisturizer and foundation for over 15 years and I absolutely love this product. Will buy again

customer_reviews.title: No one can match this Particular product
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer I’ve been using it for over twenty years

customer_reviews.title: Mary Kay moisturiser?????
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s Mary Kay product. The cream is a little heavier than the one I got from a Mary Kay consultant.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for close to 20 years. I have combination oily to normal skin. This moisturizer does exactly what it says it's supposed to do. It's supplies light moisture yet it does not create breakouts. Marykay no longer makes this moisturizer so I was glad to find it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: not happy.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with a punctured hole in it. The moisturizer had leaked everywhere...not happy.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for oily to combination skin
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I’ve been using it for years and it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth.

customer_reviews.title: Hope you always have this available!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Like it so much for moisture under the makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I wake up feeling more alive these days and my face looks great.
customer_reviews.text: Timewise Age-Fighting Moisturizer keeps my face looking soft, smooth, and glowing all day. It is the last thing I put on my face at night before I go to bed, the first thing I put on is my Timewise Night Solution Gel, 2nd is my Night Restore and Recover Cream and the last thing that I use is the Moisturizer and my face is lighter, softer looking, and smooth! very smooth!
customer_reviews.author: McNair2000

customer_reviews.title: Mary Kay rocks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using MK for 42 years. I like not going through a rep

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Best moisturizer I’ve been using this for years it’s not greasy amazon has great price on this and you don’t have to deal with sale persy

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!!
customer_reviews.text: Time wise is always a great product for the skin, I use on my face,neck and hands.

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the reviews before purchasing. This is a scam. It was a Mary Kay container but the contents smelled like a cheap alcohol based lotion

customer_reviews.title: Not the product it used to be.....
customer_reviews.text: I used up my old one so just started using this one and it is very watery. I have used the Mary Kay moisturizer with sunscreen for years and loved it this "new one" needs help as tends to separate and very runny. I need to shake before every use. No, do not like it.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was glad I could find this online I really like the product

customer_reviews.title: My favorite moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite moisturizer! I have oily skin. This moisturizer actually absorbs into the skinny and doesn’t stay on the surface leaving a slimy feeling. I put it on at night every night and keeps my skin very moisturized.

customer_reviews.title: Buy again but the same price from last year
customer_reviews.text: Hi I bought this product did you thinks I can pay the same amount from last year

customer_reviews.title: Love MK
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Mark Key products since I was 21 years old. Now 10 years later I am so glad I started taking care of my skin when I did because I can easily pass for a 25 year old! You can use the moisturizer to help with applying your foundation.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Product for my Acne Scars..
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my Face and have help me with my acne scars getting better, at first were deep visible and through the years had been less visible.. I use it everyday and under my Mary Kay Make Up.

customer_reviews.title: Suspect damaged producs
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time and the packaging was a little damaged but otherwise fine. However, once I started using the product I noticed the lotion has a severe smoke smell. I suspect these are damaged products they are trying to re-sell.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and now readily available
customer_reviews.text: Love this product ! I’ve been using it for 40 years ! Thankfully I can get it through Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Mary Kay moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like Mary Kay moisturizer I’ve been using their product for many years.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite moisturizer. I don't know what else to say - it isn't greasy, it absorbs into your skin, and really hydrates your skin (doesn't just put oil on it). I love it. I live in the mojave desert and it is dry here. Skin is always dry, and it works well for me.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely lotion
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years and very pleased with it. Glad I could find it since they have changed it to something else.

customer_reviews.text: She loves the product. Trust me she's a tough buyer.

customer_reviews.text: I have used this product in the past, although not for some time. I had great results with the product in the past. I just feel its a little pricey for my fixed income. But, I am treating myself today!

customer_reviews.title: Like this version better
customer_reviews.text: I like this version better than the new one I just wish it was cheaper

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product I’ve used it in the past...they have changed time wise moisturizer smaller tube, equals smaller amount of product, and it was more expensive

customer_reviews.title: A Mary Kay disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Do not like this new moisturizer; much preferred the one in the white bottle with pink lid. When I use this moisturizer, ten minutes later my face feels dry and tight. Put more on, in about half an hour my face feels dry and tight, etc. Cannot keep apply the stuff all day long. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer ever!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only moisturizer I’ll use. Sadly, cant get it from MaryKay anymore. The new replacement for this is not even close to the original.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this for years, and now she can purchase it through Amazon!

customer_reviews.title: Love the TimeWise
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat customer buying this moisturizer through Amazon. This moisturizer definitely beats out Clinique's yellow moisturizer which is not as thick.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: Great Daily Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over 10 years and Mary Kay has discontinued it. It is lightweight and not greasy. I was happy to find it from a seller on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Davis

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its Mary Kay
customer_reviews.text: I have used Mary Kay for many years and this time I notice that I have to apply the cream several times in order to moisturize my skin. Not sure if it is really Mary Kay. Packaging seems fine but lacks quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Castillo

customer_reviews.title: I love this moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived promptly. I love this moisturizer; has a matte finish, no shine and makeup can be applied so easily. Will continue to purchase this product from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Good balance of moisturizers
customer_reviews.text: Combination skin still needs moisturizers. This provides a great balance of moisturizers without leaving any oily residue. Mary Kay foundation glides over the moisturizer very smoothly, and you can even use less foundation because it doesn't soak into your dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: JoBuck

customer_reviews.title: But I like that it doesn't seem to clog my pores and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this product before my make up is applied. It doesn't seem to greasy, it leaves a shine on my face without make up. But I like that it doesn't seem to clog my pores and helps with a smoother application with make up.
customer_reviews.author: Smurfettecutie

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best moisturizer out there. I love this stuff. I can use it 10 times a day or just once. It isn't greasy and it always feel perfect when I apply it. My kids who are 12 and 14 also use this as their daily moisturizer. I've used ALL the expensive moisturizers from La Mer to Arbonne. Seriously, this is my ultimate favorite! Will NEVER be without this.
customer_reviews.author: S. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product a long time ago, but now ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy this product a long time ago , but now I realized that that product is 7 years old defeated cause a couple of months ago my face has been giving signs of mistreatment and has been because of it, that disillusioned I have stayed with it is buys.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: I have been using Mary Kay for about 10 yrs ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Mary Kay for about 10 yrs and I couldn't do without the moisturizer. It keeps my face clear and I notice a difference when I run out. Lasts 4-5 months. I use it morning/evening
customer_reviews.author: Milinda R Seekford

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: I've tried just about every moisturizer under the sun. I have very oily skin. This is the only moisturizer I have found that doesn't make my skin more oily. I'm able to use it twice a day (morning and night) and not be overly oily.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bowden

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, good value
customer_reviews.text: I keep reordering this because it is an excellent go-to. I'm not willing to spend more, and I feel like this is a great product for the price. I have rather oily skin and this feels very light and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: every time i apply it my skin feels super fresh non oily and my pores some how look ...
customer_reviews.text: i suffered from acne in the past, and sometimes i still get some few pimples, this cream is heaven! every time i apply it my skin feels super fresh non oily and my pores some how look smaller, if u suffer from acne or have oily skin this is the cream for u.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Gaviria

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome moisturizer! My skin is combination to oily skin and it does not feel greasy at all! It is very light and you only need to use a pea size amount. The smell is light and no heavy smell. I will definately get this again.

customer_reviews.title: This moisterizer is really great! I decided to get it despite the fact ...
customer_reviews.text: This moisterizer is really great! I decided to get it despite the fact that products sometimes are different online than when you finally receive them in hand. So, I took the risk, and guess what? I was pleasantly surprised. The quality is excellent for the price. The packaging is excellent and protects it during shipping. I also received it faster than I expected! Please note that I received this product at a discounted price in exchange for an honest review. Despite the discounted price, I have not allowed the opinions expressed in this review to be affected. Therefore, I have consistently made sure my review remains balanced and accurate. Thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Quester92

product_meta.title: Mary Kay TimeWise Age Fighting Moisturizer combination/oily
product_meta.description: TimeWise Age-Fighting Moisturizer (combination to oily) This oil-free lotion helps reduce the appearance of fine lines for younger-looking skin. Plus, it contains an antioxidant to help guard against free radicals which cause the skin to age. The combination to oily formula helps absorb and control oil while providing essential hydration and special ingredients to give the skin a silky feel with a matte appearance.
